comments:
This course gives elementary applications of decision analysis, game theory, probability and statistics to issues in areas such as accounting, contracting, finance, law, and medicine.

Math 180 is “a great course for those looking to complete the formal reasoning requirement without having to do calculus.” Students emerged from the course with knowledge that they could “relate to real life situations.”

Professor Jauregui “did an exceptional job teaching the course.” He “made things easily graspable and kept student interest” through games and real-life examples. He is “an amazing instructor” who “genuinely wants students to understand the material.” He was also willing to meet with students outside of class. 

Students should expect exams and weekly homework assignments, but the course was manageable. No prior calculus knowledge is required. 
Note: Less than eight students reviewed this course.
